Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State, #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/14th Place
ShortDescription: Northbound #29 State, #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 14th, Wabash, Roosevelt, due to street blockage near State/14th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State, #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 14th, Wabash, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near State/14th Place.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
